text: First bell is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by PG Vishwambharan, starring Jayaram, Jagadish, Anusha and Sainudeen in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/first-bell-malayalam-movie/ ==Plot== Pirappankodu Prabhakaran(Jayaram) and Pindimala Paulraj(Jagatheesh) gets kicked out of their drama troop. On the street they witness Yamuna(Anusha) being dragged to mental hospital. From her mother they find out she is normal and its all a trap and ask their help to save her. Their plots after plots fails and Prabhakaran gets locked in hospital cell. Paul approaches nurse Beena(Geetha Vijayan) to rescue Yamuna and Prabhakaran who are trapped.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0353453/plotsummary?ref_=ttmi_stry_pl/ ==Cast== * Jayaram as Pirappankode Prabhakaran/K.Prasanth * Jagadish as Paul Raj * Siddique as Poochkkal Rasheed * Rajan P Dev as Chittar Vakkachan * Sainudeen as Kunjuraman * Anusha as Yamuna * Geetha Vijayan as Beena * Riza Bava as Dr.Krishnakumar Kurup * Bobby Kottarakkara *Harishree Ashokan * Mala Aravindan * Paravoor Bharathan as Kurup *Thodupuzha Vasanthi as Aymanam Amminikutty * Sukumari * PP Subair * Narayanankutty == Soundtrack == {| class="wikitable" |- !
